Name: Hunters Life
About the game: Hunters Life is a game where you have to go through different rooms. Each room has a finish point and to solve this you need to find clues and combine them to open up next room. The game is simple, it can be finished quickly depending on your mind skills. There are a total of 6 rooms. All levels need to be open in differents way. Can you use your mind and complete all rooms?
Meta Title: Hunters Life: Dec 14, 2018, David Ruland and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hunters Life? Check out the release date (Dec 14, 2018), developer insights from David Ruland, and a complete game summary.
